error_msg: The parameters for random forest must be one or more of ['n_estimators', 'max_depth', 'min_samples_split', 'random_state', 'min_samples_leaf', 'max_leaf_nodes'].
description: RF is a learning algorithm that combines a collection of uncorrelated predictor trees and averages them.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'n_estimators' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
oneOf.description: The 'n_estimators' parameter corresponds to the number of decision trees. It must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'max_depth' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.
oneOf.description: The 'max_depth' parameter corresponds to the maximum depth of the tree. It must be an integer greater than or equal to 1.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'min_samples_split' parameter must be a number greater than or equal to 2.
oneOf.description: The 'min_samples_split' parameter is the minimum number of samples required to split an internal node. It must be a number greater than or equal to 2.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'min_samples_leaf' parameter must be a number greater than or equal to 1.
oneOf.description: The 'min_samples_leaf' parameter is the minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node. It must be a number greater than or equal to 1.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'max_leaf_nodes' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 2.
oneOf.description: The 'max_leaf_nodes' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 2.

oneOf.error_msg: The 'random_state' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 0.
oneOf.description: The 'random_state' parameter must be an integer greater than or equal to 0.
